text: Perpetual mess Tara Reid has finally decided to try and shed her drunk-girl image and has entered rehab. "Tara Reid has checked herself into Promises Treatment Center, '' her rep told UsMagazine.com. "We appreciate your respect to her and her family's privacy at this time. '' The actress, who has n't done anything to speak of in years, has been seen, on so many occasions, wasted out of her mind, unwittingly flashing the paparazzi on the red carpet, looking scary-skinny, and making really D-list personal appearances. Rehab has been calling her name loud and clear for years. Best decision ever. Good luck, Tara.
title: It's about time, right?
